name: Thief vs Village
description:
Synopsys

"Thief vs Village" is a game where you will have the role of a thief who must steal the resources from the village warehouse and avoid the guards so as not to end up executed by the guillotine!!

A Day Cycle has been added to give the game more realism and to let the player know what time of day is. So, depending on the time you in the game the NPCS will do one thing or another!

Controls
  • The player moves with "WASD" and the camera follows. 
  • You can use the “SPACE” to change the camera: follow the player or he can go on his own. 
  • Can do Zoom In / Zoom Out in both modes with the mouse wheel. 
  • To steal the warehouse resources you must click on the “STEAL” button in the store. 
  • The possibility of advancing and pausing time has been incorporated although it should be mentioned that if it is used there are times when the NPCS do not detect the colliders.
How it works?

The town has different areas and different NPCS:

  • Forest: 
    • The woodcutters work: They cut trees, gather wood and plant new trees.
  • Farm: 
    • The Farmers work: They plant, water and harvest what they have grown. If they stay without water they will go to the well to fill the bucket with water and continue watering their crops.
  • Mining: 
    • The miner works: Collect resources in the mine (gold, ingot, coal).
  • Village: 
    • There are elderly villagers who walk around the village. 
    • There is a bar in the one that all the villagers are going to spend their free time. At each one's bedtime, these they go to their respective houses.
    • The Guards: If they find the thief they will take her to the guillotine!!
  • Field:
    • Area where the shepherd grazes with his sheep. 
  • Town warehouse: 
    • Once the workers finish their work shift, they leave all the resources obtained during your working hours here.
